instructions: Render individual story documents with scenarios added to docs/stories/map/{epic}/{sub-epic}/{story}.md structure.
**IMPORTANT:** Check planning decision criteria for Scenario Outlines:
- IF 'Yes': Include Scenario Outlines with Examples tables (data-driven tests)
When domain_concepts exist in the story graph, structure example tables to mirror the domain model:
- Use parent_table for the main entity being tested
- Use children_tables array for related/collaborating entities
- Map one-to-one relationships: child table has same row count as parent
- Map one-to-many relationships: child table has multiple rows per parent foreign_key
- Columns should reflect domain concept responsibilities
- Foreign keys link tables matching the collaborator relationships
Each story document includes: Story Description, Acceptance Criteria, Background (if applicable), Scenarios.
